body_html: The new smoothing is nice. But we lost the ability of being able to peek at values in the non-smoothed region. It would be good to let the tooltip show up when mousing in that region (and perhaps show blank under the "smoothed" column).
body_text: The new smoothing is nice. But we lost the ability of being able to peek at values in the non-smoothed region. It would be good to let the tooltip show up when mousing in that region (and perhaps show blank under the "smoothed" column).
body: The new smoothing is nice. But we lost the ability of being able to peek at values in the non-smoothed region. It would be good to let the tooltip show up when mousing in that region (and perhaps show blank under the "smoothed" column).
